changeSet.author: isolovev
changeSet.comment: Add a new column: 'message_type' to 'gctemplate' table.
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE gctemplate ADD COLUMN message_type text NOT NULL; UPDATE gctemplate SET message_type=IF(delayednote=true, 'DELAY', IF(name regexp '^TSE', 'GENERIC', 'REPORT')) WHERE id>0;
changeSet.rollback: ALTER TABLE gctemplate DROP COLUMN message_type;
